headline: Is There Opportunity in Welltower After Its 40% Price Surge in 2025?
summary: If you are holding Welltower stock or thinking about scooping up some shares, you are not alone. This real estate powerhouse has been turning heads lately. With a share price resting at $174.9 and a year-to-date return of 40.2%, it is no wonder investors are re-examining where the next move might take the stock. Over the last week, Welltower rose 5.9%, outpacing broader market trends and suggesting renewed optimism. Across three and five years, the numbers are even more striking, with gains...
